import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router" const EditUser = () => { const id = useParams().id const users = useSelector(state => state.systemUsers.users) const [user, setUser] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { setUser(users.find(user => user._id === id)) }, [users, id]) return ( <>

Edit {`${user.FirstName} ${user.LastName}`}

setUser({...user, FirstName: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, LastName: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, Username: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, CreatedDate: e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user, SessionTimeOut: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default EditUser
